Never mind!!!! Fixed it.
The game was installed in another folder than I saved it. So I went to the right installation folder, and clicked on sims 3, then "game" and then "bin" and there I copy the crack from sims 3.
I did the same for ambitions etc...
Andnow it works.
Thx!
